resources.string:
"Do you really want to set this user as your default user?
After launching app next time, data of this user will be the first one to show up."
Do you really want to logout user?

Application couldn\'t log in this user to GAiT website.\nTry logging in directly through GAiT website.\nIf you could log in properly and this message keeps popping up, please inform me about this through contact form at dev.ravensu.com/contact

Welcome!

Following application is NOT affiliated with Gdańskie Autobusy i Tramwaje.

This application has been created as a hobby project for GAiT's drivers, their families and their friends.

Main purpose of this application is to make it possible for drivers to view information about theirs assignments in a more clear and transparent way. Assignments' data is fetched from site made for employees (podzialy.gait.pl). Even though creator of this app made every effort to make it free of any bugs and mistakes, he cannot guarantee that these won't occur and he cannot be held liable for any damages caused by errors in application.

In case of finding any bug, you can report it through contact form on dev.ravensu.com/contact

Have a nice use! :)
Bartosz Baum | ravensu.com

This application is NOT affiliated with Gdańskie Autobusy i Tramwaje.\nCreator of this app made every effort to make it free of any bugs and mistakes, however he cannot guarantee that these won\'t occur and he cannot be held liable for any damages caused by errors in application.\nData used in this application is fetched from site podzialy.gait.pl using webscrapping method.
You can learn more about this application and see source code at github.com/Raven351/GAiTPodzialy
There was an error while attempting to load users.\nIt could be caused because of weak internet connection.
